item.title: Publications
item.description: 2020 Mary Mikhail, Adam Roegiest, Karen Anello, Winter Wei. Dancing with the AI Devil: Investigating the Partnership Between Lawyers and AI. CHIIR 2020. Jean-Philippe Gauthier, Adam Roegiest. Spectator: An Open Source Document Viewer. CHIIR 2020. 2019 Adam Roegiest, Edward Lee. On Tradeoffs Between Document Signature Methods for a Legal Due Diligence Corpus. SIGIR 2019. Jonathan Donnelly, Adam Roegiest. On Interpretability and Feature Representations: An Analysis of the Sentiment Neuron. ECIR 2019.

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently the Director of Research at Kira Systems where I guide the direction of the team and aid in the deployment of the team’s insight into production. Prior to this I was alternatingly a Product Manager and Research Scientist at Kira. Prior to Kira, I completed my PhD at the University of Waterloo under the supervision of Gordon V. Cormack (and occasionally Charlie Clarke, when Gordon was on sabbatical).
